results.content:
To start on theme development is a great course. For plugins, it has just few videos with a very basic intro.
Good resources are provided, and you can make a reference book to use.
The course really gives the knowledge to make a full Wordpress theme from a HTML one.

response.content: Thank you very much :) I am really happy, you joined my course. Good luck with your learning.

results.content: Very well explained and to the point. I have seen tutorials much better than this. But I wanted something that's short and crisp. I found everything here, the only issue was the accent, which I think becomes a no factor once a student finds that he/she is learning a useful stuff.
